Name: Swap Blocks
About the game: In Swap Blocks you will match 3 or more similar blocks on a game board by swapping blocks. Play solo game modes, or play against a CPU or another player. There are also various challenge puzzles to test you. Features Multiple game modes Puzzle Editor Challenge Levels VS Mode 2 different play styles Achievements Online Leaderboards
